title: BBMRI Metadata
description: This is the blueprint of the metadata block specific for the BBMRI community

study_id.title: Study ID
study_id.description: The unique ID or acronym for the study

study_name.title: Study name
study_name.description: The name of the study in English

study_description.title: Study Description
study_description.description: A description of the study aim

principal_investigator.title: Principal Investigator
principal_investigator.description: The name of the person responsible for the study or the principal investigator

study_design.title: Study design
study_design.description: The type of study. Can be one or several of the following values.

disease.title: Disease
disease.description: The disease of main interest in the sample collection, if any. Can be several values MIABIS-21

categories_of_data_collected.title: Categories of data collected
categories_of_data_collected.description: The type of data collected in the study, and if biological samples are part of the study. Can be one or several of the following values: Biological samples, Register data, Survey data, Physiological measurements, Imaging data, Medical records, Other

planned_sampled_individuals.title: Planned sampled individuals
planned_sampled_individuals.description: Number of individuals with biological samples planned for the study

planned_total_individuals.title: Planned total individuals
planned_total_individuals.description: Total number of individuals planned for the study with or without biological samples

sex.title: Sex
sex.description: The sex of the study participants.

age_interval.title: Age interval
age_interval.description: Age interval of youngest to oldest study participant, for example 40-80

material_type.title: Material type
material_type.description: The nature of the biological samples that are included in the study, if any. Can be one or several of the following values: Whole blood, Plasma, Serum, Urine, Saliva, CSF, DNA, RNA, Tissue, Faeces, Other
